targets.query: SELECT mean("Percent_User_Time") AS "% User Time" FROM "win_cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Available_Bytes") as "Available Bytes" FROM "win_mem" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(linear) ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("Available_Bytes") as "Available Bytes" FROM "win_mem" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(linear) ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") FROM "hyperv_vmnet" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /_Network Adapter_/ AND "instance" =~ /^$vm_nic$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(none)

SELECT mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") FROM "hyperv_vmnet" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /_Network Adapter_/ AND "instance" =~ /^$vm_nic$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(none)
SELECT last("Bytes_Sent_persec"), last("Bytes_Received_persec") FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance"
SELECT last("Bytes_Sent_persec"), last("Bytes_Received_persec") FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance"
SELECT last("Bytes_Sent_persec"), last("Bytes_Received_persec") FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance"
SELECT last("Bytes_Sent_persec"), last("Bytes_Received_persec") FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance"
SELECT sum("Reads_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_filesystem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$csv_volume$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(none)
SELECT last("Dirty_Bytes") FROM "Storage_Spaces_Drt" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "host" fill(none)
SELECT last("Dirty_Bytes") FROM "Storage_Spaces_Drt" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "host" fill(none)
SELECT last("Dirty_Bytes") FROM "Storage_Spaces_Drt" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("Reads_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance"
SELECT "Disk_Transfers_persec" FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" > '2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"
SELECT "Disk_Transfers_persec" FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" > '2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"
SELECT sum("Reads_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("instance" =~ /^$csv_volume$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance"
SELECT max("Writes_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("instance" =~ /^$csv_volume$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance"
SELECT sum("Reads_persec"), sum("Writes_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("instance" =~ /^$csv_volume$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance"
SELECT "Disk_Transfers_persec" FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" > '2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"
SELECT "Disk_Transfers_persec" FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" > '2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"
SELECT mean("Read_Bytes_persec") FROM "hyperv_storage" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$vm_disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(none)
SELECT mean("Read_Bytes_persec") FROM "hyperv_storage" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$vm_disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(none)
SELECT mean("Read_Bytes_persec") FROM "hyperv_storage" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$vm_disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(none)
SELECT mean("Read_Bytes_persec") FROM "hyperv_storage" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$vm_disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(none)
SELECT mean("Write_Bytes_persec") FROM "hyperv_storage" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$vm_disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(none)

SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") FROM "hyperv_vmnet" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /_Network Adapter_/ AND "instance" =~ /^$vm_nic$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(none)

SELECT mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") FROM "hyperv_vmnet" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /_Network Adapter_/ AND "instance" =~ /^$vm_nic$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Host
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: Cluster Volume
list.name: csv_volume
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cluster_csv_filesystem" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.label: Virtual Machine
list.name: virtual_machine
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hyperv_vid" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/

list.label: VM Disk
list.name: vm_disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hyperv_storage" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/

list.label: Virtual Switch
list.name: virtual_switch
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hyperv_vswitch" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
